data.name: Lo-Fi mockups for 10/13/16 6pm SEFmeeting
Create appropriate routes and models
data.description: Create the necessary routes and models to get started

data.name: Create a db:seed file for test data
data.description: Create a seed file for our test data

data.name: Google Maps Integration
data.description:
As a user on the hospital page
I want to see the location of the hospital on a map
So that I know where the hospital is

data.name: Read Denari API Docs
data.description: Get familiar with the API for Denari

data.name: Individual Hospital Page
data.description:
As a user
I want to see donors for a hospital
So that I can see who contributed to a project

data.name: Main Page Hospital List
data.description:
As a user
I want to see all the hospitals
So that I can see all the ongoing projects

data.name: As a user, So I have a pleasurable viewing experience, I want a nice UI
data.description: In order to have an engaging website, we need an nice UI. This feature will be to set up a basic bootstrap template to have a decent looking UI. We will fine tune and finalize the UI in later iterations after more features are implemented.

data.name: As an admin, I want an admin portal, So that I can edit data
data.description: We need an admin portal to edit data on the website. This includes editing or removing dedications and adding hospitals

data.name: As a user, I want an individual donors page, So I can see all dedications made by a specific donor
data.description: This is similar to the the individual hospital page. It will be a place to see all the dedications made by an individual donor. It is just a place to see what different donors have been donating to.

data.name: As a user, I want to see an individual dedication page, So I can see/share different dedications
data.description: When you click on a dedication, you will be taken to a new page with a larger version of the dedication. The main purpose of this page is to be able to share different dedications. The page will have Facebook, Twitter, Email and other social media sharing options.

data.name: As a user, I want to see anchor links on the hospital page, so that I don't have to scroll down to find them
data.description: The hospital page will have all of its donations/dedications on its page. To avoid scrolling a long way to find certain donor levels (e.g. Gold, Silver), we will add anchor links such that clicking on them takes the user to the corresponding donor level.

data.name: As a donor, I want to give consent and submit my dedication, so that I can be on the wall of founders
data.description: This will show a form where a donor submits their dedication and has the option of giving consent to show up in the wall of founders.

data.name: Fix errors controller
data.description: The errors controller is poorly written. It is poorly covered by tests and does not make proper use of the flash. Reimplementing this based on feedback from our design review.

data.name: fix login route
data.description: logging in automatically directs you to the admin page. should instead redirect you to the page you were already on.

data.name: Push to production
data.description: Pass over API keys and login information. talk to derrick about proper handover procedure.

data.name: README Deployment Instructions
data.description: Write out steps to deploy app on README

data.name: As a user, So that I am motivated/inspired to donate, I want a more engaging UI
data.description: Further enhance the UI to better engage the user. Make the interface easy to navigate and follow the style guidelines of Sankara Eye Foundation. Also, show more metrics about the impact each hospital/donation has on an individual.

data.name: As a user, I want to see a list of all dedications, So I can easily see what causes people are donating to
data.description:
This will serve as a page for users to browse what other people are donating to and what their dedications will say. It is a more generic way to view dedications, as opposed to viewing dedications through the hospital pages. 

People should be able to sort this list of dedications by most recent, random, or any some other criteria. The hope is that non donors can be inspired to donate after viewing this page.

data.name: As a user, I want to be able to sign up for an account  So I can edit my dedications
data.description:
Once a donor makes a dedication of at least $1000, an admin will need to email them a link to give consent and submit their dedication if they want to be on the Wall of Founders. 

This link needs to be encoded with the correct donor id, so it is matched to the correct user and also needs to be a one time edit link. 

This will serve as the main workflow for getting donors onto the Wall of Founders

data.name: As a donor, I want to be able to contact the admin, So I can edit my dedication/relay any concerns
data.description: Once a user publishes their dedication, they can no longer edit it themselves since it will be going on the physical wall. In order to edit they must contact the admin through a form.

data.name: As a user, So that I have a more engaging UI, I want to see a styled login/logout page
data.description: The current login/logout page is default Devise views. We need to add some bootstrap styling to this

data.name: Anchor links causing refresh
data.description: The anchor links are refreshing the page instead of jumping to the correct section of the page.

data.name: As a user, So that I can quickly find information, I want a search bar
data.description: Adding a search bar will make finding individual donors or dedications much easier and faster.

data.name: As a user, So that my dedication feels meaningful, I want a more personable UI for the dedication page.
data.description: The individual dedication pages aren't very personal, and we would like to make those pages be more meaningful for the donors.

data.name: As a user, So that I have a better user experience, I want to see Sankara branding and a mobile optimized UI
data.description: At the moment, the navigation bar gets cut off when browsing on mobile.

data.name: As an admin, So that I can email donors their login credentials, I want to be able to download a CSV of all donors that need to be added.
data.description: After a user makes their donation, they need to be added to the digital wall of founders so they can add their dedication. To do this, the admin should be able to download a list of users that they need to email activation codes to.

data.name: As a user, I want to see the most up to date information, So I know the exact status of each hospital
data.description: Need to sync up local app database with the Denari management system used by Sankara Eye Foundation. Denari is the source of truth for donor data, so we must properly sync the web app with this service to have accurate information.

data.name: As an admin, I want to be able to make an edit on the web app, So that it is also edited in Denari
data.description: In order to make data management simpler, admins should be able to use our admin portal to edit any data that is to be shown on the website. The "source of truth" is Denari, so any change made on the web app should also change Denari.

data.name: As an admin, So that I can make the hospitals more interesting, I want to be able to upload photos.
Make API keys/passwords secret
data.description: Use Figaro and follow Armando's blog post.
